Name: Meowjiro
About the game: Meowjiro is a part-time job simulator. To be successful as a convenience store clerk you must have the energy to be on your feet for most of the day while maintaining a positive attitude. Store Clerk Responsibilities: Ring up purchases. Clean the store. Keep track of stock inventory. Warm up bentos. Make ice creams. Spend your wage on Meowjiro. There might be something happen to Meowjiro when it is full. Buy new furniture and make your home cozy. Game Features Various convenience store minigames. Various customers. Cute cat. Having a cozy little home.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Meowjiro? Check out the release date (Nov 8, 2022), developer insights from 02GAMES, and a complete game summary.
